rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd

res.rBody:
Utinam appenderentur peccata mea quibus
iram merui ira merui iram meruit et calamitas quam patior
in statera in statura

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd

verses.vBody:
Quasi arena maris
haec gravior apparet et gravior apparet haec gravior appareret haec gravior apparens unde et verba mea dolore sunt plena

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd
